 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוּז‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==almond-tree, almond-wood== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לוּזָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***almond*** ([[BDB#Löw|Löw]]<sup>No. 319</sup>), whence Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> as loan-word ([[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>145</sup> [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 157 f.</sup>), Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — [[Gen.30.37|Gen 30:37]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִבְנֶה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַרְמוֺן לַח‎</span>) of rods stripped by Jacob.
